example.text: Today marks the first International Women's Day since the Supreme Court obliterated our rights less than a year ago in overturning 50 years of Roe; 50 years of a woman's right to choose. In States across this country, the right to an abortion is under attack even in cases of rape, incest, and the health of a mother.

The fentanyl epidemic is a life-or-death issue — not a Republican or Democratic one. That’s why I was proud to introduce the bipartisan END FENTANYL Act to help stop the flow of fentanyl into our country. On #NationalFentanylAwarenessDay, let's recommit ourselves to take action. [[url]]

Every veteran should have the resources & support they need to secure permanent housing. Proud to stand with [[user]] & [[user]] to introduce legislation that would grant [[user]] a congressional charter so they can expand access to their critical services.

Nevada is on the front lines of the climate crisis. That’s why we're leading the charge to tackle it, lower energy costs, and protect our state’s future. Great to join [[user]]’s [[user]] and [[user]] for tonight’s climate tele-townhall!

My amendment underscores the fact that it is not the sole responsibility of the executive office of the President to reduce inflation, but that productive, bipartisan legislative action is the best way that we can collectively combat inflation and bring down the cost of living. I represent southern Nevada, a part of the country that has been especially hit hard by the price hikes driven up by the pandemic, supply chain disruptions, and Putin's invasion of Ukraine.

The fentanyl epidemic is a life-or-death issue — not a Republican or Democratic one. That’s why I was proud to introduce the bipartisan END FENTANYL Act to help stop the flow of fentanyl into our country. On #NationalFentanylAwarenessDay, let's recommit ourselves to take action. [[url]]
